SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by survey_Id DESC) AS row_num ,B.syllabusName, S.courseID, S.survey_Id,S.writeDate FROM COURSE A, SYLLABUS B, SURVEY1 S WHERE A.syllabusID = B.syllabusID AND A.courseID = S.courseID)
WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
order by survey_Id DESC
SELECT s.syllabusName, c.courseID FROM COURSE C INNER JOIN SYLLABUS S ON C.syllabusID = S.syllabusID WHERE courseShow='Y'
SELECT count(*) FROM survey1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by partnerLicenseNum DESC) AS row_num ,partnerLicenseNum ,partnerState ,partnerName ,partnerInformation ,partnerPhoneNumber ,partnerAddress ,partnerEmail ,partnerCEO ,partnerHeadCount ,partnerApplyYN ,partnerApplyFinishDate ,partnerURL ,partnerRegisterDate FROM partner )
WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT count(*) FROM partner
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by notice_no DESC) AS row_num ,notice_no ,notice_category ,notice_title ,notice_adminID ,notice_date ,notice_hit FROM notice )
WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}

SELECT count(*) FROM notice
SELECT count(*) from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by ct.courseTake_ApplyDate) as row_num, m.userId, m.userName, m.userPhoneNumber, m.userEmail, s.syllabusName, ct.courseTake_State, ct.courseTake_ApplyDate, ct.courseTake_CompleteDate from course_take ct join kt_user m on ct.userId = m.userId join partner p on p.partnerLicenseNum = m.userCompany join course c on c.courseId = ct.courseId join syllabus s on s.syllabusId = c.syllabusId where p.partnerLicenseNum=#{partnerLicenseNum})
SELECT * from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by ct.courseTake_ApplyDate) as row_num, m.userId, m.userName, m.userPhoneNumber, m.userEmail, s.syllabusName, ct.courseID, ct.courseTake_State, ct.courseTake_ApplyDate, ct.courseTake_CompleteDate from course_take ct join kt_user m on ct.userId = m.userId join partner p on p.partnerLicenseNum = m.userCompany join course c on c.courseId = ct.courseId join syllabus s on s.syllabusId = c.syllabusId where p.partnerLicenseNum=#{partnerLicenseNum})
WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
select count(*) from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by ct.courseTake_ApplyDate) as row_num, m.userId, m.userName, m.userPhoneNumber, m.userEmail, s.syllabusName, ct.courseID, ct.courseTake_State, ct.courseTake_ApplyDate, ct.courseTake_CompleteDate from course_take ct join course c on c.courseid = ct.courseid join syllabus s on s.syllabusid= c.syllabusid join kt_user m on m.userid = ct.userid where
s.syllabusName like '%'||''||'%'
s.syllabusName like '%'||#{syllabusName}||'%'
and to_char(c.courseStart,'YYMMDD') - '000101' > 0
and to_char(c.courseStart,'YYMMDD') - #{courseStartDate} > 0
and to_char(ct.coursetake_completedate,'YYMMDD') IS NULL
and to_char(ct.coursetake_completedate,'YYMMDD') - #{completionDate} > 0
and m.userName like '%'||''||'%'
and m.userName like '%'||#{userName}||'%'
and m.usercompany =#{partnerLicenseNum})
select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by ct.courseTake_ApplyDate) as row_num, m.userId, m.userName, m.userPhoneNumber, m.userEmail, s.syllabusName, ct.courseID, ct.courseTake_State, ct.courseTake_ApplyDate, ct.courseTake_CompleteDate from course_take ct join course c on c.courseid = ct.courseid join syllabus s on s.syllabusid= c.syllabusid join kt_user m on m.userid = ct.userid where
s.syllabusName like '%'||''||'%'
s.syllabusName like '%'||#{syllabusName}||'%'
